data.title: eBay Inc Company Profile - eBay Inc Overview
data.meta_description: Up-to-date eBay Inc company overview including funding information, company profile, key statistics, peer comparison and more.
data.text: eBay Inc (eBay) is an e-commerce marketplace that connects buyers and sellers. The company through its platform offers antiques, art, baby products, books, auto parts and accessories, clothing, shoes, lifestyle accessories, collectibles, office equipment, craft, and electronics. It also offers other products such as home and garden, industrial equipment, sports, health and beauty. eBayâ€™s platforms include its online marketplace, www.ebay.com and its localized counterparts, including an off-platform business in Japan, and its suite of mobile apps. These platforms are accessible through laptop, desktops, tablets, smartphones, and its application programming interfaces. eBay is headquartered in San Jose, California, the US.
